title: "NLP vs. NLU vs. NLG: the differences between three natural language processing concepts"
excerpt: "While natural language processing (NLP), natural language understanding (NLU), and natural language generation (NLG) are all related topics, they are distinct ones. At a high level, NLU and NLG are just components of NLP. Given how they intersect, they are commonly confused within conversation, but in"
